resources.string: If you enjoy using this app, would you mind taking a moment to rate it? It won\'t take more than a minute. Thanks for your support!
How was your experience with the Time Calculator?
The app is absolutely free.\nYou can contribute to the development of the app by writing a review!
If you enjoy using this app, would you mind taking a moment to rate it in the store?\n\nYour review will help this app develop further.
I want to improve the App with your help. Don\'t hesitate to send an email with your suggestions.\n\nSend an email?

For your best user experience, the application is now free and ad-free.
 If you would like to support me, as a developer of the app, you can buy me some CUPS of TEA.
Any purchase will give you a green star to the right of the corresponding button

You can also leave a review to help improve the app.
